en.title: 10 Signs of Stress in Cats: Key Behavioral Cues to Watch For
en.content:
Cats cannot communicate stress through words. It is important to recognize stress by observing changes in their behavior.

10 Signs of Stress in Cats

1. Hiding more often. 2. Changes in appetite (decreased or overeating). 3. Excessive grooming (over-licking leading to hair loss). 4. Inappropriate elimination. 5. Becoming aggressive. 6. Excessive vocalization. 7. Stopping grooming altogether. 8. Changes in sleep patterns. 9. Spraying behavior. 10. Diarrhea or vomiting.

Common Causes of Stress

Major causes include environmental changes (moving, rearranging furniture), new family members or pets, noise, litter box issues, boredom, and frequent absence of the owner.

Stress Relief Measures

Effective strategies include providing safe hiding spots for your cat, using pheromone products such as Feliway, making environmental changes gradually, and ensuring plenty of playtime.

zh.title: 猫咪压力的10大信号：不可忽视的行为观察要点
zh.content:
猫咪无法用语言表达压力。通过观察行为变化来识别压力非常重要。

猫咪压力的10大信号

①躲藏次数增多 ②食欲变化（食欲下降或暴食） ③过度理毛（舔舐过多导致脱毛） ④随地排泄 ⑤变得具有攻击性 ⑥过度叫唤 ⑦停止理毛 ⑧睡眠模式改变 ⑨喷尿行为 ⑩腹泻或呕吐

压力的常见原因

主要原因包括环境变化（搬家、重新布置家具）、新增家庭成员或宠物、噪音、猫砂盆问题、无聊以及主人经常不在家等。

减压对策

有效的方法包括为猫咪提供安全的藏身之处、使用费利威等费洛蒙产品、循序渐进地改变环境、确保充足的游戏时间等。
